overview.content: Deliver powerful customer experiences. Build unique customer interactions across mobile and web through channels like email, push, in-app, and SMS.

features.content: Delight your audience at every point in their customer journey, from automated campaigns, one-time sends, and transactional messages.

featureItems.connect: Target specific groups with an offer or message
featureItems.unify: Leverage real-time data to test your hypothesis
featureItems.customize: Create automated or API triggered workflows

overview.content: Connect first-party data to every tool in your tech stack with Data Pipelines, a customer data platform (CDP), so you can focus on what matters mostâ€”building relationships with your customers.

features.content: Consolidate touch points from any source, including your data warehouse, for a complete view of your customer. Pair with Journeys to build unique personalized interactions.

featureItems.scale: Architected to meet all your data needs
featureItems.connect: Ensure all your security standards are met
